segments.text: I see the woman standing in the puddle of water, and it makes me a bit sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused on drying that plate, unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is really making me nervous; he could fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is just waiting patiently for her cookie, not noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the woman hasn't turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the water damage to the cabinets is going to be a big problem if it's not fixed soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite sneaky, taking cookies without the woman knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip on the wet floor and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; it really worries me to see the boy standing on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the calm garden outside, which is such a contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees the children before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
